General.Name: Hummingbird Resources PLC
General.Description: Hummingbird Resources PLC, a mining company, engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in West Africa. The company primarily explores for gold ores. It principally holds interests in the Yanfolila gold mine located in Mali; the Kouroussa gold project located in Guinea; and the Dugbe gold project located in Liberia. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Birmingham, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 35421 Kanis Road, Paron, AR, United States, 72122
